ComicInfo.Summary:
It's training day at the Harbinger Foundation! As Stronghold struggles to control his powers, Twenty-Twenty keeps mental tabs on certain members of the team. But what happens when this rogue harbinger pushes his mind-scans too far?
Ax rejoins his team of Harbinger henchmen, having just lost an arm battling Bloodshot. While Ax is busy building himself a mechanical arm, Twenty-Twenty continues monitoring Eggbreaker activities through Spikeman's eyes. But Harada discovers this, and backtracks the psychic link to fry Twenty-twenty's brain! The Eggbreakers, including Livewire and Stronghold, are then dispatched to nail Ax and his gang!
1st appearances:
Livewire / Amanda McKeeScoutRoxyTwenty Twenty
